column4: hey all: how do I get sound working for a nivida 6150se +430?
hmm i think that is a graphics card
well nvida 6150 is a graphics card
maybe this?  00:04.0 PCI bridge: nVidia Corporation MCP61 PCI bridge (rev a1)
oops this:  00:05.0 Audio device: nVidia Corporation MCP61 High Definition Audio (rev a2)
How would I install that and get my sound working?
it depends on what type of sound card you have:  lspci | grep Audio
did you find your audio card?
how would I check which it is lspci or grep?
that's what you need just copy and paste into a terminal window, and copy and paste result back here.
okay you have the same setup I do.
ok, so how do I get the sound working. I also tryed the video drivers from nvidia, it gave me a X server running error.
it works right from the get go, but you should get the drivers in the repo, not the site.
where do I download the repo drivers?
